articles.title: Kim Jong Un Visits Ministry of People's Security
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Visits Ministry of People's Security
 Pyongyang, May 1 (KCNA) -- Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, visited the Ministry of People's Security to congratulate the people's security persons and service personnel of the Korean People's Internal Security Forces (KPISF) on May Day.
					 He was accompanied by Choe Ryong Hae and Jang Song Thaek.
					
					Kim Jong Un had a photo session with people's security persons and service personnel of KPISF.
					
					 He paid tribute to Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il before their statues, together with the commanding officers accompanying him.
					
					 He said that the erection of their statues at the ministry strikingly demonstrates the unshakable will of all people's security persons and service personnel of KPISF to eternally hold the peerlessly great men in high esteem and devotedly defend the socialist system, a precious legacy bequeathed by the Generalissimos.
					
					 He underscored the need for them to eternally hold the Generalissimos in high esteem as the sun of Juche, firmly defend and glorify their undying revolutionary exploits with pure revolutionary conscience and strong sense of obligation.
					
					 He gave important instructions to tighten people's security and bolster up the combat capabilities of KPISF in every way.
					
					 The Ministry of People's Security and KPISF play a very important role for defending the socialist system, he said, adding that the people's security persons and service personnel of KPISF should be deeply aware of their heavy yet honorable combat missions.
					
					 He underlined the need to strengthen the people's security organ and the internal security forces as units defending the policies of the party, strong guardians of socialism, merciless striking forces and reliable protectors of the lives and properties of the people.
					
					 The enemies are now afraid of our single-minded unity around the party more than anything else and running the whole gamut of desperate and base moves to destabilize and bring down our society, he noted.
					
					 Now that the enemies are working hard to bar our people from trusting and following the party with pure conscience and fixed will and alienate the masses from it, it is important to intensify the struggle to frustrate their moves, he stressed.
					
					 He called for devotedly defending the party, social system and people, decisively foiling the ideological and cultural poisoning and psychological warfare of the enemies and mercilessly wiping out the undesirable and hostile elements who have foolish day dreams.
					
					 He underlined the need for the ministry and the internal security forces to make full combat preparations to annihilate the U.S. imperialists and south Korean puppet group keen to stifle the DPRK and to creditably fulfill their missions and duties in the sacred struggle to provide a firm guarantee by dint of arms and law for the implementation of the party's line on simultaneously pushing forward the economic construction and the building of nuclear force.
					
					 Our Juche-oriented socialist country is invincible as the Korean People's Army and KPISF, the two revolutionary armed forces of the WPK, are firmly defending the security of the country and people, he said.
					
					 He inspected Unit 2219 of KPISF that day.
					
					 He gave the unit a pair of binoculars and an automatic rifle as gifts before having a photo session with its service personnel, expressing belief that they would safeguard the socialist system as firm as an iron wall.
					
					 He went round the lecture room of the O Jung Hup political university, a messroom, soldiers' bed room, education room and wash-cum-bath room.
					
					 He was satisfied to see good conditions in the bed room, praising the unit for keeping the wash-cum-bath room with a sauna attached neat and clean.
					
					 At the education room he underscored the need to train the soldiers to be strong in idea and faith by intensifying politico-ideological education among them.
					
					 Then he guided a drill of soldiers.
					
					 After watching it, he highly appreciated their success in the drill and indicated tasks for bolstering up the combat capabilities of the unit.
					
					 He expressed belief that just as the service personnel of KPISF have always did, the soldiers of the unit would display a do-or-die will and matchless courage and thus become iron shields and fierce tigers devotedly defending the party, social system and people in their struggle to decisively foil the enemies' moves to stifle the DPRK.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Watches Sports Games of Workers in Field of Public Health
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Watches Sports Games of Workers in Field of Public Health
 Pyongyang, May 1 (KCNA) -- Sports games of workers in the field of public health took place on May Day.
					 The dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, watched the sports games together with Ri Sol Ju.
					
					 The participants in the games were divided into Pothonggang and Taedonggang Teams. Male and female volleyball matches took place first.
					
					 The Pothonggang Team defeated its rival in the breath-taking male volleyball match and the Taedonggang Team trounced its rival in the female volleyball match.
					
					 Then followed table-tennis matches.
					
					 Men's and women's singles and doubles and singles of leading officials of the relevant units were played, drawing the attention of the spectators.
					
					 The Pothonggang Team won the men's and women's singles and men's doubles while the Taedonggang Team emerged a winner in the women's doubles.
					
					 The Pothonggang Team won the singles of leading officials of the relevant units.
					
					 The Pothonggang Team beat its rival 4:1 in the table-tennis matches.
					
					 A tug of war took place between the two teams.
					
					 The Pothonggang Team won the game.
					
					 Kim Jong Un clapped his hands whenever the players displayed high technique.
					
					 The results of various events were announced and prizes distributed.
					
					 Kim Jong Un waved back to the enthusiastic cheers of the players and spectators and congratulated them on the successful games.
					
					 Among the spectators were Pak Pong Ju, Choe Ryong Hae, Jang Song Thaek, Kim Kyong Hui, Kim Ki Nam, Choe Thae Bok, Pak To Chun, Kim Yang Gon and other senior officials of the party, the state and the army and workers in the field of public health.

articles.title: National Meeting Marks May Day
articles.content:
National Meeting Marks May Day
 Pyongyang, May 1 (KCNA) -- A national meeting was held at the Hwanghae Iron and Steel Complex Wednesday, the 123rd May Day.
					 Present there were Pak Pong Ju, Kim Ki Nam and Yang Hyong Sop, and officials of the local party and economic organs, labor innovators and other people.
					
					 Premier Pak Pong Ju, member of the Political Bureau of the C.C., the Workers' Party of Korea, made a report at the meeting.
					
					 He said that May Day is a significant holiday for fully demonstrating the revolutionary spirit and militant power of the working people of Songun Korea who are making devoted efforts for the prosperity of the country, united around the Workers' Party of Korea in one mind, adding that it also serve as a holiday for strengthening international solidarity with working people the world over who are struggling to break iron chains of capital and attain democratic freedom and right and lead an independent life.
					
					 The working people of the DPRK are extending militant greetings and firm solidarity to the working people the world over struggling for a just and peaceful new world under the banner of independence against imperialism on May Day, he noted, and went on:
					
					 President Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il wisely led the Korean people to successfully discharge their noble historic mission and duty in the struggle for realizing the revolutionary cause of Juche, the socialist cause.
					
					 The dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un is trusting and putting forward the workers and other people as revolutionary comrades and comrades-in-arms and energetically leading them to dynamically advance toward the final victory.
					
					 The workers and other people of the DPRK have devotedly worked for the country and revolution with hammers, sickles and writing brushes remaining true to the leadership of the party and the leader in the annals of the Korean revolution that was adorned with victory and glory.
					
					 There are many countries in the world and each country has many working people but there are no working people as those of Songun Korea who devote themselves to the patriotic cause with their creative labor efforts, displaying the independent dignity as human beings and leading a worthwhile and proud life under the care of the peerlessly great persons.
					
					 The reporter underscored the need to defend the dignity and sovereignty of the nation and build the best country, the people's paradise on this land, by carrying out the new strategic line on simultaneously pushing forward economic construction and the building of nuclear force in the spirit of the March, 2013 Plenary Meeting of the C.C., the Workers' Party of Korea under the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Senior Party and State Officials Mark May Day with Workers
articles.content:
Senior Party and State Officials Mark May Day with Workers
 Pyongyang, May 1 (KCNA) -- Leading officials of the Workers' Party of Korea and the state significantly celebrated the 123rd May Day on Wednesday, together with working people across the country.
					 Kim Yong Nam and Pak Pong Ju, and officials of the party organs, the Cabinet, working people's organizations, ministries, national institutions and local party and power bodies went to the Kim Jong Thae Electric Locomotive Complex, the Pyongyang Thermal Power Complex, the Pyongyang Kim Jong Suk Textile Mill, the Chongsan Cooperative Farm in Kangso District and other institutions, enterprises, factories and farms to congratulate the workers, farmers and intellectuals on May Day.
					
					 They laid floral baskets and bouquets before the statues of President Kim Il Sung, portraits of the smiling President and General Secretary Kim Jong Il and mosaics portraying them.
					
					 They went round the revolutionary museums dealing with the tireless efforts and leadership feats of the peerlessly great persons and rooms dedicated to the history of relevant units.
					
					 They met with labor innovators who are making a breakthrough in the drive for a great surge in the spirit of the March, 2013 Plenary Meeting of the C.C., the Workers' Party of Korea and encouraged them to increased production.
					
					 They mixed with workers to play colorful sports and amusement games such as a tug of war, Korean chess and yut-games. They enjoyed art performances.
					
					 The senior party and state officials encouraged all working people to create miracles and innovations in the production and construction and thus contribute to building the best country, the people's paradise on this land under the leadership of the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Unhasu Concert Given to Mark May Day
articles.content:
Unhasu Concert Given to Mark May Day
 Pyongyang, May 1 (KCNA) -- The Unhasu concert was given at the People's Theatre here to Mark the May Day.
					 Among the audience were Kim Yong Nam, Yang Hyong Sop, Ri Yong Mu, Kang Sok Ju, O Kuk Ryol, Kwak Pom Gi and Ro Tu Chol, and vice-premiers, labor innovators and other people of industrial establishments in Pyongyang.
					
					 The concert began with the National Anthem amid the boundless reverence for the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The repertoires included mixed chorus "May, Month of Victory", male solo "Chollima Gallops Forward" and male sextet "Are We Living Like in Those Days?"
					
					 The performers sang high praises of undying feats of the peerlessly great persons who built a socialist power independent in politics, self-supporting in economy and self-reliant in national defence and made the working people enjoy a worthwhile life as the masters of the power possessed of nuclear weapons and satellites by arousing their tremendous mental power and unity.
					
					 Put on the stage were numbers reflecting patriotism and loyalty of the working people of the DPRK who have adorned annals of victory of socialism while always sharing the destiny of the party, holding the great leaders in high esteem.

articles.title: May Day Marked in DPRK
articles.content:
May Day Marked in DPRK
 Pyongyang, May 1 (KCNA) -- The May Day was significantly marked in the DPRK on Wednesday.
					 Parks, pleasure grounds, industrial establishments and cooperative farms were in a festive mood with colorful art performances and sports and amusement games.
					
					 Artistes of the Phibada Art Troupe gave a performance at the plaza of the Arch of Triumph and the National Folk Art Troupe at the Taesongsan Pleasure Ground. Put on the stages were mixed quartet "Our Leader Loved by People" and male duet "Peace Is Guaranteed by Our Arms". The performers sang high praises of the undying feats of the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Acrobats of the National Circus put on the stage acrobatics at the Mangyongdae Amusement Park. Builders of the capital city spent the holiday, playing sports games at Kim Il Sung Stadium.
					
					 The workers of the Huichon Power Station, the Pyongyang and Pukchang thermal power complexes, those of the Kangson Steel Complex, Songjin Steel Complex, the Kim Chaek Iron and Steel Complex and the Hwanghae Iron and Steel Complex, coal miners in Anju and other working people in the fields of light industry and agriculture across the country added to the atmosphere of the holiday with sports and amusement games.
					
					 Intellectuals of the State Academy of Sciences, the Academy of Agricultural Science, the Academy of Medical Science and other scientific research field across the country significantly marked the May Day.

articles.title: DPRK Workers Blessed with Great Leaders
articles.content:
DPRK Workers Blessed with Great Leaders
 Pyongyang, May 1 (KCNA) -- On this May Day, the people in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea are sorely missing Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, who always found themselves among the popular masses in their lifetime.
					 In the period of Japan's colonial rule over Korea, its working masses had to undergo a slavery life, being subject to exploitation and oppression.
					
					 President Kim Il Sung liberated Korea through a protracted anti-Japanese armed struggle and turned the working masses into masters of their own destiny and the country.
					
					 His energetic and wise leadership served as a source of making the Korean workers fully display their devotion and heroism in production and construction at every stage of the developing revolution.
					
					 After the Korean War (1950-1953), workers of the Kangson Steel Plant turned out 120,000 tonnes of rolled steel at the blooming mill with a rated capacity of 60,000 tonnes, signaling the start of the Chollima movement. And those of the Kim Chaek Iron Works produced 270,000 tonnes of pig iron by equipment with a rated capacity of 190,000 tonnes.
					
					 The Korean workers manufactured a trial tractor in 30 days and a truck in 40 days for the first time in the country, while the socialist industrialization was carried out in a matter of 14 years.
					
					 They also gave a facelift to Pyongyang City in the 1970s and 1980s, working miracles in creation and construction.
					
					 General Secretary Kim Jong Il had always considered the working class to be driving force in building a thriving nation.
					
					 Encouraged by his deep trust, Korean workers effected fresh upsurges one after another in different economic sectors, making a breakthrough in building an economic power.
					
					 The Generalissimos' history of leadership over the working class continues still now under the wise guidance of respected Marshal Kim Jong Un, who shows all sorts of loving care for the workers, saying that Korean society is for them.

articles.title: Birthday Spread Sent to Pro-reunification Patriot
articles.content:
Birthday Spread Sent to Pro-reunification Patriot
 Pyongyang, May 1 (KCNA) -- Han Jang Ho, pro-reunification patriotic fighter, greeted his 90th birthday.
					 He was born to a poor family in Hwadae County, North Hamgyong Province and was subject to a slave like life of a colony. He keenly felt the stateless grief and after the liberation of Korea he ardently yearned for the northern half of Korea, working as a teacher in south Korea.
					
					 After he was arrested by the enemy in the struggle for national reunification, he firmly adhered to the revolutionary faith and obligation for 39 years, weathering bestial torture and appeasement and deception of the hangmen.
					
					 General Secretary Kim Jong Il made sure that he and other former unconverted long-term prisoners were brought to the care of the DPRK and put forward them as pro-reunification patriot fighters, DPRK heroes and recipients of the National Reunification Prize.
					
					 The dear respected Kim Jong Un saw to it that Han Jang Ho participated in the celebrations of the centenary of birth of President Kim Il Sung and the 59th anniversary of the Korean people's victory in the Fatherland Liberation War as delegate.
					
					 The birthday spread sent by Kim Jong Un was conveyed to Han Jang Ho on Wednesday.

articles.title: May Day Marked by Papers
articles.content:
May Day Marked by Papers
 Pyongyang, May 1 (KCNA) -- Papers here today dedicate editorials to May Day.
					 The working people of Songun Korea are the fighters and patriots who have performed heroic feats for the party, leader, country and revolution under the wise leadership of the peerlessly great persons of Mt. Paektu, Rodong Sinmun says, and goes on:
					
					 The Korean people have now turned out as one in the drive to carry out the strategic line on simultaneously pushing forward economic construction and the building of nuclear force set forth at the historic March, 2013 Plenary Meeting of the C.C., the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					 Steadfast is the idea and cause of the WPK as there are the ten million-strong ranks sharing the intention and destiny with the leader, true to the thought and line of the party at any place anytime.
					
					 As the people face a do-or-die battle of whether they defend independence or fall to subordination, they entered the all-out action to settle accounts with the U.S. imperialists in the spirit of the resolute anti-U.S. struggle.
					
					 Korean-style socialism is invincible as long as there are the indomitable people who do not make the slightest concession or compromise in order to protect their idea and social system.
					
					 There is no limit to the mental power of the working people of the DPRK who are making great leap forward and innovations after laying the firm foundation for overtaking the world with their own efforts and technology despite the imperialists' persistent moves to isolate and stifle the DPRK.
					
					 The DPRK will shed its rays as a great heroic country of miracles as there are the people with indomitable will to build a thriving nation of Juche on this land.
					
					 Minju Joson says the Korean people are displaying their might as the most revolutionary people upholding the party and the leader with faith and obligation. The DPRK will certainly attain a high eminence of an economic power and fully display the dignity and national power of Songun Korea thanks to their devoted efforts, the paper concludes.

articles.title: S. Korean Puppet Army's Spy Drone Crashes
articles.content:
S. Korean Puppet Army's Spy Drone Crashes
 Pyongyang, May 1 (KCNA) -- A spy drone of the south Korean puppet army crashed into a ground around a primary school in Hongchon County, south Korean Kangwon Province on April 30 while staging the north-targeted war drill, according to south Korean Yonhap News.

articles.title: Signature Campaign Launched in S. Korea
articles.content:
Signature Campaign Launched in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, May 1 (KCNA) -- The Council for the Solution of the Issue of the Volunteers Corps in south Korea conducted a signature campaign outside the Posin Pavilion on April 27 in demand of the settlement of the issue related to sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army.
					 The council demanded the Japanese government make an official apology to victims to sexual slavery and make legal reparation for them. More than 360,000 persons have so far participated in the signature campaign which started in March.
					
					 The council will continue the signature campaign till signatories reach 100 million, it said, adding it would make international human rights bodies and world civic and public circles convince through the signature campaign that the settlement of the issue related to sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army is the common task of mankind.

articles.title: S. Korean Police Searches Houses of Those Concerned of Railway Workers Union
articles.content:
S. Korean Police Searches Houses of Those Concerned of Railway Workers Union
 Pyongyang, May 1 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet police searched houses of six persons concerned of the Railway Workers Union on April 29 on charges of the violation of the fascist "Security Law".
					 The fascist police committed such violence for the reason that they formed an organization with the "aim to benefit enemy", sought to expand "forces following the north" and manufactured and distributed "copies of literature benefiting enemy", the ones praising the north.
					
					 The police stormed houses of those concerned of the union in Seoul, Inchon, Taejon, Pusan and Kyonggi Province and confiscated computers, various documents, cell phones, etc.
					
					 The south Korean puppet group is made up of traitors blinded by confrontation with fellow countrymen as it is kicking up hysteria for confrontation with the DPRK by groundlessly linking even the union with the DPRK.

articles.title: S. Korean Warmongers Begin Another Large-Scale Military Drill
articles.content:
S. Korean Warmongers Begin Another Large-Scale Military Drill
 Pyongyang, May 1 (KCNA) -- The "Ryonsung" Unit under the Seventh Division of the south Korean puppet army started the large-scale field mobile exercise in the area of Hwachon, south Korean Kangwon Province on Apr. 29, according to south Korean Yonhap News.
					 It was reported that the military drill will last till May 3 under the pretext of increasing the ability for local war and all-out war.
					
					 The puppet warmongers obsessed with new war hysteria keep staging military drills in the wake of their north-targeted military rehearsals with the U.S. imperialist aggressor forces, straining the situation.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Published in Italy
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Published in Italy
 Pyongyang, May 1 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il's work "Let Us Carry Out the Great Leader Comrade Kim Il Sung's Instructions for National Reunification" was published in booklet by the Movement for Peace and Socialism of Italy on April 24.
					 The work published on August 4, Juche 86 (1997), deals with the immortal exploits performed by President Kim Il Sung for national reunification, formulates the three principles of national reunification, the 10-point programme of the great unity of the whole nation and the proposal for founding the Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo as the three charters for national reunification and indicates tasks and ways for achieving the reunification of the country on the basis of them.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il Praised by Swiss Organizations
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il Praised by Swiss Organizations
 Pyongyang, May 1 (KCNA) -- The Switzerland-Korea Committee and the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea released a joint statement on April 24 to mark the 81st anniversary of the Korean People's Army (KPA).
					 The statement said President Kim Il Sung embarked on the road of the revolution in his early years and founded the genuine revolutionary armed forces of the people.
					
					 It continued:
					
					 The Korean People's Revolutionary Army (KPRA) waged the hard-fought anti-Japanese war and liberated the country under the leadership of Generalissimo Kim Il Sung.
					
					 After the liberation the KPRA developed into the KPA, regular armed forces.
					
					 Thanks to the Songun leadership of Kim Il Sung, invincible and iron-willed commander, the heroic KPA could defeat U.S. imperialism for the first in history and achieve a shining victory in the Fatherland Liberation War that was fought for three years.
					
					 The victory won by the army and people of the DPRK greatly inspired the global people in their national liberation struggle and building of new societies.
					
					 Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il frustrated all the aggression moves of the U.S. imperialists against the DPRK with their Songun revolutionary leadership.
					
					 Today the KPA has grown to be a strong army with a powerful war deterrent that strikes any aggressors with horror.
					
					 The 80 odd year-long history of the KPA is really a history of a shining victory.

articles.title: Efectuado acto central por 123o aniversario del Primero de Marzo
articles.content:
Efectuado acto central por 123o aniversario del Primero de Marzo
Pyongyang, 1 de mayo (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar este miercoles el acto central por el 123o aniversario del Primero de Mayo, fiesta internacional de los trabajadores de todo el mundo.
					Estuvieron presentes Pak Pong Ju, Kim Ki Nam, Yang Hyong Sop y otros cuadros, los funcionarios de los organismos del partido y economia en localidades, los ameritados laborales y trabajadores.
					
					Pak Pong Ju, miembro del Buro Politico del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y primer ministro del Consejo de Ministros de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, presento el informe.
					
					El senalo que el Primero de Mayo es una fiesta significativa para poner de pleno manifiesto el temperamento revolucionario y la combatividad de los trabajadores de la Corea del Songun, quienes se esfuerzan con abnegacion por la prosperidad de la patria uniendose en torno al PTC e intensificar la solidaridad internacional con los trabajadores de todo el mundo en la lucha por destruir la cadena del capital y alcanzar la libertad y derechos democraticos y la vida independiente.
					
					Subrayo que los trabajadores coreanos envian el saludo combativo y la firme solidaridad a todos los trabajadores del mundo que luchan por construir un nuevo mundo justo y pacifico bajo la independencia antiimperialista.
					
					Se refirio a que el Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il dirigieron sabiamente a los trabajadores coreanos para que cumplieran con su noble mision historica y deber en la lucha por realizar la causa revolucionaria del Juche, la socialista.
					
					Asevero que el Mariscal Kim Jong Un confia y presenta a la clase obrera y los demas trabajadores como camaradas de la revolucion y de armas y les conduce para que avancen con pasos firmes hacia la victoria final.
					
					Recordo que en los anales de la revolucion coreana anotados con victorias y glorias, los obreros y trabajadores de la RPDC han venido luchando con abnegacion por la patria y la revolucion tomando en sus manos el martillo, la hoz y la pluma en apoyo a la guia del partido y el lider.
					
					En este mundo hay incontables trabajadores en diversos paises, pero nadie lleva una vida digna y honrosa como los trabajadores de la Corea del Songun quienes en el regazo de los grandes hombres sin pares se dedican a la empresa patriotica con sus esfuerzos creativos y laborales ostentando la dignidad independiente del ser humano, recalco.
					
					Exhorto a defender la dignidad y la soberania de la nacion al materializar cabalmente la nueva linea estrategica de desarrollar paralelamente la construccion economica y la de las fuerzas armadas nucleares en acato al espiritu del pleno de marzo de 2013 del Comite Central del PTC  y siguiendo la guia del Mariscal, y asi levantar en este territorio la mejor potencia, paraiso del pueblo.

articles.title: Cuadros de RPDC celebran Primero de Mayo junto con trabajadores
articles.content:
Cuadros de RPDC celebran Primero de Mayo junto con trabajadores 
Pyongyang, 1 de mayo (ACNC) -- Los cuadros directivos del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y el Estado celebraron este miercoles el 123o aniversario del Primero de Mayo con los trabajadores de distintas localidades.
					Kim Yong Nam, Pak Pong Ju y otros funcionarios del partido, el Consejo de Ministros, entidades de trabajadores, ministerios, organos centrales, instituciones del partido y el poder de las localidades visitaron el Complejo de Locomotoras Electricas Kim Jong Thae, el Complejo Termoelectrico de Pyongyang, la Fabrica Textil Kim Jong Suk de Pyongyang, la Granja Cooperativa de Chongsan del municipio de Kangso y otros organos, empresas, fabricas y granjas para felicitar a los obreros, los trabajadores agricolas y los intelectuales que celebran su fiesta.
					
					En los terrenos, ellos depositaron los cestos y ramos de flores ante las estatuas de bronce del Presidente Kim Il Sung y los retratos con amplia sonrisa de los grandes hombres sin pares y los murales de mosaico con sus imagenes.
					
					Recorrieron los museos de la historia revolucionaria, las salas de presentacion del historial y otros lugares alusivos a la vida revolucionaria y las hazanas de direccion de los grandes hombres sin pares.
					
					Se reunieron con los innovadores laborales que en pleno acato al espiritu del pleno de marzo de 2013 del Comite Central del PTC, abren la brecha de victoria en la marcha de gran auge de hoy y les estimularon para que sigan registrando el auge productivo.
					
					Luego hicieron junto con los trabajadores la lucha de cuerda, ajedrez y Yut (juego folclorico coreano) y otros juegos deportivos y recreativos y vieron las funciones artisticas preparadas en ocasion de esa efemeride.
					
					Les encomendaron hacer aporte a levantar sobre este territorio un pais poderoso y el paraiso del pueblo al registrar milagros e innovaciones en la produccion y construccion siguiendo la orientacion del Mariscal Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: RPDC celebra el Primero de Mayo
articles.content:
RPDC celebra el Primero de Mayo
Pyongyang, 1 de mayo (ACNC) -- En ocasion de la fiesta internacional de los trabajadores, tuvieron lugar este miercoles funciones artisticas, juegos deportivos y de diversion en los parques, jardines de recreo, fabricas, empresas y granjas cooperativas en distintas localidades de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					Los artistas del Conjunto Operistico Mar de Sangre y del Conjunto Nacional de Arte Tradicional ofrecieron sus funciones en la explanada frente al Arco de Triunfo y en el recreo del monte Taesong, respectivamente.
					
					A traves de diversas piezas, incluyendo el cuarteto mixto "Nuestro dirigente adorado por el pueblo", el duo masculino "Nuestra bayoneta garantiza la paz" y el solo femenino "No podemos olvidar las pruebas atravesadas por el Lider", los ejecutantes encomiaron altamente las imperecederas hazanas de los Generalisimos Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il.
					
					Los acrobatas del Conjunto Circense Nacional ofrecieron sus funciones en el Parque de Atracciones de Mangyongdae y los constructores de esta capital organizaron una competencia deportiva en el Estadio Kim Il Sung.
					
					Fueron peculiares los paisajes de los rios Taedong y Pothong por los ciudadanos que pasaban el tiempo paseando en bote. 
					
					Los productores de electricidad de Huichon, Pyongyang y Pukchang, los obreros de las acerias de Kangson, Songgang, Kimchaek y Hwangchol, los carboneros de la zona de Anju y los trabajadores de la rama de industria ligera y de agricultura de todas las localidades pasaron la fiesta haciendo los juegos deportivos y recreativos.
					
					Ademas, la pasaron con jubilo los intelectuales de la rama de ciencia e investigacion inclusive la Academia Estatal de Ciencias, la Academia de Ciencias Agricolas, la Academia de Ciencias Medicas.

articles.title: Periodicos dan a conocer a trabajadores de Corea del Songun
articles.content:
Periodicos dan a conocer a trabajadores de Corea del Songun
Pyongyang, 1 de mayo (ACNC) -- Los periodicos de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea difundieron este miercoles los editoriales dedicados al Primero de Mayo.
					En su editorial, Rodong Sinmun subraya que los trabajadores de Corea del Songun son combatientes y patrioticos que bajo la destacada direccion de los grandes hombres del monte Paektu, crearon las proezas heroicas para el partido y el lider, la patria y la revolucion.
					
					Hoy dia, el pueblo coreano se ha levantado como un solo hombre en la lucha por materializar la linea estrategica de desarrollar paralelamente la construccion economica y la de las fuerzas armadas nucleares presentada en el historico pleno de marzo de 2013 del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, destaca el diario y continua:
					
					Son firmes la idea y la causa de nuestro partido gracias a contar con la fila trabajadora que armada con la idea y linea del partido, comparte el proposito y el destino con su dirigente.
					
					Ahora, en que se desarrolla una batalla que decide la independencia y la subyugacion, con el firme espiritu de lucha antiyanqui, nuestro pueblo entro en el enfrentamiento total para saldar cuenta final con el imperialismo norteamericano.
					
					Sera invencible el socialismo de nuestro estilo mientras que exista el indoblegable pueblo que no sabe la concesion ni conciliacion en la defensa de su idea y su regimen.
					
					Es inagotable la fuerza espiritual de los trabajadores coreanos que aun en medio de las tenaces maniobras de aislamiento de los imperialistas, prepararon la base capaz de superar con sus propias fuerzas y tecnologias el alto nivel de talla mundial y crean el gran salto y gran innovacion.
					
					Gracias al pueblo dispuesto a levantar en esta tierra un Estado prospero del Juche, nuestra patria seguira ostentando como gran pais de milagro y como Corea heroica.
					
					El periodico Minju Joson se refiere a que los trabajadores de Corea manifiestan su poderio de trabajadores revolucionarios apoyando con su conviccion obligacion moral al partido y el lider y anade que por su lucha abnegada, la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea alcanzara la alta cima de la una potencia economica y ostentara la dignidad y el poderio nacional de la Corea del Songun.
